name: url-shortener
description: ### Prerequisite * A short domain name * An AWS account with a [Route53 hosted zone](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/Route53/latest/DeveloperGuide/CreatingHostedZone.html) and [ACM certificate](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/acm/latest/userguide/acm-overview.html) set up in `us-east-1` - these are not part of this CloudFormaton stack sice you'd normally keep them in separate stacks. * [AWS SAM CLI](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/serverless-application-model/latest/developerguide/serverless-sam-cli-install.html)
